name: title
description: The title of the drop. This is only being displayed in the bottom drawer in the mobile view.

name: closeOnClick
description: Determines if the drop should close when clicked.

name: dropId
description: The element ID of the drop.

name: isNestedElement
description: Determines if the drop element is nested.

name: nestedParentRef
description: The parent `OcDrop` ref of the nested drop.

name: mode
description: Determines the event that triggers the drop.

name: offset
description: The visual offset of the drop.

name: paddingSize
description: The padding size of the drop.

name: popperOptions
description: The popper options of the drop. Please refer to the component source for more information.

name: target
description: Element selector that can be used as a target of the drop.

name: toggle
description: CSS selector for the element to be used as toggle. By default, the preceding element is used. Note that a toggle is mandatory for the bottom drawer in mobile view.

name: enforceDropOnMobile
description: Enforce the drop to be displayed even on mobile devices where usually a bottom drawer is used.
